data.name: Minerva user menu addPortletLink fix
data.description:
https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/T236711
mw.util.addPortletLink works inside Minerva but it produces menu items that have no design consistency with the rest of the skin.

data.name: Crunchyroll Enhancer
data.description: This userstyle tries to enhance the overall look of Crunchyroll. Now with a dark mode. Source code on GitHub

data.name: watch2gether no chat/larger player
data.description: Simply removes the chat from watch2gether and makes the player larger, also makes the top bar a bit smaller.

data.name: 专心做题，屏蔽干扰
Reduce Clutter
data.description: Fix recent update in Stack Exchange family. Copied from Samuel Liew. Note that two sections are removed since it’s been fixed officially.

data.name: stewmac Dark by BamaBraves
Supraforums Classic
data.description:
Takes parts of the new site design back in time a bit with a classic logo and colors.  Also includes some general improvements to the layout for viewing on a desktop PC and sticky post highlights.

Updates

1/26/2020
- Updated the counter for sticky threads to fix the highlighting
